articles.content:
It's an honor to be nominated, but sometimes the right people don't get that honor.

articles.title: Cannes Film Festival: 6 movies that could make a splash in 2021 - NBC News
articles.description: The Cannes Film Festival kicked off last week, returning to the French Riviera for the first time since Bong Joon Ho’s “Parasite” nabbed the Palme d’Or.
